noPermission.description_limit_premium: Upgrade to the Premium plan to unlock unlimited features!
noPermission.description_premium_feature: This feature is only available with the Premium plan. Upgrade now to unlock it!
noPermission.description_embed: You do not have permission to use this command!
noPermission.description_embed_no_features: The feature is currently disabled. An administrator needs to enable it for it to be usable.
noPermission.description_embed_no_features_by_system: This feature is temporarily disabled for extraordinary maintenance. Please be patient: it will be available again shortly.

welcomeModal.description: You have successfully configured the welcome message. Now, when new users join the server, the message will be sent to the selected channel.
